website_summaries.verdict: A sleek and affordable double burner setup that can be used indoors or out.
pros: Feet on the bottom prevent sliding
Consumes little space in the kitchen
cons: Water takes longer to boil than it would on a regular stovetop

customer_reviews.title: Avoid it.
customer_reviews.text: If someone is looking at this product in 2020, save your money if you read this. Please avoid it, it stops working after few months of use. In the few months it does give you utility, you’ll have to deal with the headache of it auto shutting off when it reaches a certain temperature where they (the stoves) stop providing any more heat. Boiling water on this is like a challenge, you pass then you get tea!
customer_reviews.author: NightFury!

customer_reviews.title: amazing how bad this is
customer_reviews.text: Wish I never bought this! it was hard to clean, very slow to heat up, the knob position did not seem to have any relationship with what temp it was, and it often would stay on even though I had turned it off. I had to always unplug it. Water took forever and a day to boil. I'm talking about a good half hour . This is a piece of junk. Even though the price is low, you still don't get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this electrical stove thinking usually imusa brands are good but this one doesn’t even heat up the whole coils and when one is one the other shuts off it was working mediocre for a weeks now it just doesn’t want to heat up at all I have to move the coils to try to get it to heat if that. Cheap purchase not worth the purchase better to just save your money for a gas one.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Stopped functioning after a week
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product twice: the first time it lasted about a year of daily use before one of the burners stopped working. I thought that was a decent life span for the cost, so I purchased a replacement. The second unit only lasted a week of use before both burners spontaneously gave out mid cook, never to function again. Unfortunately, the return window had already lapsed. I’m hoping that this was a defective unit and that the seller will respond to this review. I will add edits if appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: average_guy

customer_reviews.title: 1500W Dual burners
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a while since I figured this would be cheaper than buying an extra stove/oven when I need multiple burners (the family has a big meal with guests every few weeks). It cooks pretty fast and works pretty well. The only issue I have with it is larger pots of water need the lide on to get boiling and maintain a boil, so be sure to keep that in mind if you plan on using larger pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Damián

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: One of the burners didn't work after 3 weeks and I'm not sure if its because of the usage I put it through. I used an larger pot such as a pressure cooker and after that use the light came on but no heat. I think I will upgrade and get an additional warranty for the 10 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard. Avoid for your safety please
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this piece of junk. Bought as backup in case power went out. We finally used it in April 2020 and once turned on one of burner coils caught in fire. Hole appeared and ash spread everywhere. Total fire hazard. Avoid for your safety
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G Foo

customer_reviews.title: Fantatic electric stove 👍👍
customer_reviews.text: I gave as gift my neighbor stove is Broken ,I it's a beautiful small eletric stove it works very well .....and It doesn't take a lot of space . My neighbors was so happy ,He lovez his little stove ❤❤
customer_reviews.author: Iris Ort

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Wholy S—-! I unwrapped it and plugged it in. The moment I turned it on it was the 4th of July sparks all over and even tripped my circuit breaker. I requested a replacement crossing my fingers but be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: This to e came broken they took long to answer so my husband opened it was a wired disconnected in there, i bought it give or take two months ago and is already broken, burned cables and all. I live in a camper so it was my daily use. Sadly for a short period of time thou
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hafner

customer_reviews.title: Think twice....not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It was junk. Only lasted 4 months. I am remolding my kitchen and needed something to hold me over while the work was being done. I am one person and only cooked about 2-3 days a week. Still junky product that didn't last. Spend a bit more, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CharleneC

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these burner sets because my stovetop does not work well. It performs great and is a welcome addition to my kitchen. The only flaw is the thermostat, once it reaches the set temperature, it shuts off burner for a bit. Just have to keep turning it up and down for quick cooking. For warming things up, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awful all the way around
customer_reviews.text: One side didn’t work, my husband was able to fix it. One light also didn’t work. Now it totally have out 3 months after purchase. It never was that hot and took things longer to cook as it was. Now it’s trash. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: amber riha

customer_reviews.title: Broke Quickly
customer_reviews.text: After using for less than a month, the burner stopped working. I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great double burner
customer_reviews.text: So easy to work and the grates lift up so you can clean under. Exactly what I expected and needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Decent Electric Stove
customer_reviews.text: Used this for almost a year after the gas stove was removed due to construction. Food is not cooked thoroughly as a gas stove would. However, it did cook well enough for food to be eaten. The experience was not bad. Great for the price, especially if you are on a low budget. One of the burners did not work as well after a while. Also the food takes longer to cook compared to gas stove. (Overall it's ok-good)
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay, not great tho
customer_reviews.text: This was great at first, but I don’t like that after using it for a while it automatically turns the burner off in the middle of cooking. Not helpful when my food is half cooked. One burner doesn’t work very well either. But when they work, they’re not bad. I think I need to find a better one though without temp control.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kayhart

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap cheap cheap. Don’t waste your money! The heating elements are very loose & tied in with 2 wires. They don’t get very warm either, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Wubbalubbadubdub

customer_reviews.title: The weather nice about 82 degree
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't seem working at well. Take 3 hours and my pot of soup not even boiling yet. What's the hell wrong? I am so embarrassed. The weather nice about 82 degree, not windy, not rainy... sunshine and I can't make a lunch in a park with my family and friends? Wasted my time and money.
customer_reviews.author: kltv

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to use while renovating the kitchen. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use while renovating the kitchen. It works ok but when you use both burners it doesn’t get very hot. I wish I had just gotten the single because I can’t use two at the same time unless one is on very low.
customer_reviews.author: JoyP

customer_reviews.title: Extra Burners
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect when you are preparing that large meal and just need a couple extra burners. They heat up quickly too. However, they aren't meant for real "cooking" as they tent to lose some of the heat unless the pot or pan is covered.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis P. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Seems bad quality
customer_reviews.text: One side stopped working right away. Perhaps we got a dud. Purchased but didn't need right away. Finally opened to use & one side doesn't heat & in off switch is faulty. Would happily redo review if we could exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Gaialove

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly, but turns itself off after a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats quickly, but turns itself off after a couple of minutes. Don't walk off thinking your food is cooking or you'll come back to soogy food thats been sitting in juice, but not cooking. You'll have to turn it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Need something dependable?
customer_reviews.text: I got this on July 3rd of 2019 and it has quit working on September 27th. It won't turn on. I would suggest if you need this product... Buy another brand. I will be.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Johnston

customer_reviews.title: SO SO
customer_reviews.text: Used this burner for a DIY smoker had to take it apart to fit because the measurements were not correct. and didn't fit my smoker. Cut it in half and used only half of it. It's ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Burner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time buying this product. We use it everyday and product is very durable. Product has never let us down and we do a lot of cooking. Glad we have two of them now.
customer_reviews.author: DANI T.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for only three weeks, then died!
customer_reviews.text: Using this two-unit burner worked great for about three weeks, then suddenly just quit altogether. Can not recommend even though rather inexpensive. Will replace with a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Cooks well.
customer_reviews.text: This double burner electric cooktop does a good job overall. I haven’t had it a long time but I am satisfied with it. The elements are a bit slick with a cast iron skillet but it heats up fast and cycles off as intended.
customer_reviews.author: freebirdandfloyd

customer_reviews.title: small same size as the burner
customer_reviews.text: only used small same as burner size otherwise u will burn the nob lol
customer_reviews.author: Hot chocolate

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This did all that I expected. I use it as a coffee station. It frees up my range top for other cooking .
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: House literally almost burned down, both burners were in the off position and one of the burners spontaneously kicked on while there was an item still on it. If it wasn't for the smoke detectors lord knows what could have happened. Literally have had this for about a week and used it twice. Can't return it because I threw away the packaging, pissed off is not enough of a phrase
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Carson

customer_reviews.title: For who wants to cook out of the house i recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for long time it's easy to clean I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amanuel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to do. Not the most powerful by any means, but it is the cheap model. Shuts off after a while of cooking so you have to turn it off and on again to keep going.
customer_reviews.author: David Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works but doesn't hold temp
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the price but doesn't hold a temp at all. Heats up then cools off, heats up then cools off. Cooks food, does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: S & S

customer_reviews.title: Pan slides off...
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt easily boil water. Rack slightly angled. This causes pans to slip off.
customer_reviews.author: Ally P

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Takes longer to heat up but that's due to the smaller size. Has the power to cook meats, eggs and fairly quick to boil water.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: causing the pans on the burner to side off I recommend a Very Strong DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: the customer service gave a bit of a run around, the burners have a slight bow ,causing the pans on the burner to side off I recommend a Very Strong DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry  E. Waskiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous design
customer_reviews.text: The burners move a lot and do not stay on the metal plates the way they should. This can be dangerous if the burners moved during cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Simmi Sandhu

customer_reviews.title: Used item sold as new
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough, item package was open when received and had oil splatter on it.
customer_reviews.author: speearep

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of JUNK! Only used once. Right burner turned off after about 5 minutes, and will not come back on. Left burner turns on and off randomly - not to keep constant temp, just random. Unplugged for 10 minutes, tried again - no change. STAY AWAY!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday gift for my mom and its just not broken in pieces it don't even work how disappointing it wasn't even in the original box it was in a clear plastic bag with all the smashed pieces and the directions
customer_reviews.author: antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I received the item fast which was a plus. I got this item a couple of weeks ago and it already stopped working 😔 I feel like it could’ve been a good product but didn’t get to experience it that long.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Product works just fine, burners were a little not level and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works just fine, burners were a little not level and the heat didn't go to the highest point that its labeled. Does the job though when its needed.
customer_reviews.author: Casey carmickle

customer_reviews.title: It was damaged or used before it even arived.
customer_reviews.text: It had some black rusted spots or dirt or idk what it was.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: The cord is short
customer_reviews.text: The cord is so short... I'd have to sit it on the camper kitchen table so.the cord can reach the outlet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Doesn't cook as fast as a full size ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this mostly to cook outside. Works fine. Doesn't cook as fast as a full size electric range, but I'd say that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbler

customer_reviews.title: It served the purpose we needed. After a few ...
customer_reviews.text: It served the purpose we needed. After a few uses however it shorted on one side and we had to unscrew it and hook the connections back up. Have not had any problems since then. We will use it this holiday season for a warming station.
customer_reviews.author: ITAXAA

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cheaply made, would never buy this again. ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheaply made, would never buy this again. It is so lite weight that every time you move a pan on it it slides all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Bell

customer_reviews.title: Okay - but the burners seem to time out.
customer_reviews.text: the burners keep turning off after a period of time. So if you are cooking something long-term, these are not for you. I have had to turn it back on a few times already.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON M DISPIRITO

customer_reviews.title: only lasted 2 months, what a waste
customer_reviews.text: Got this product on June 2,2020...it already stopped working August 5,2020...this is ridiculous now i have to get a new one because I can't find it in any stores...
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I got this in May and it’s already not working. Only one burn was working properly. The other one was turning off constantly while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dias

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 2 duds of this burner! The first did not turn on. The 2nd could have burned our house down!! I turn one burner off, and the light does not turn off, nor does the burner!! I now have to unplug it each time it is used. I purchased this for candlemaking. NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: bhdbhd

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: It works really well for what it is supposed to do. Each burner is 750 watts.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the functioning of the burner
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the functioning of the burner, but the burners are only big enough to thoroughly heat a small pan. If you are using larger pans, start your meal earlier than needed to ensure it is ready in time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Freeman Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this. I used it today and it works good. This is vary lite and not heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: TOOTSIE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it...for some reason it worked after hours in the rain....thanks
customer_reviews.author: Fatoumata Ngom

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money on a better unit! Waste of my time to wait 25 ...
customer_reviews.text: The SLOWEST!! It takes forever to cook on it. Not very efficient. Spend the money on a better unit! Waste of my time to wait 25 minutes to boil a pot of water
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: This works OK, but takes forever to get hot ...
customer_reviews.text: This works OK, but takes forever to get hot. My water won't really boil with this, but somehow was able to cook pasta. It ends up shutting off all the time, so you have to keep resetting it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works exactly like we needed it to! Perfect little extra burner to have at holidays
customer_reviews.author: Aimee M

customer_reviews.title: These are budget burners.
customer_reviews.text: They're... cheap burners. Useful for cooking most things, but they don't get up to heat quickly, nor do they sustain it. I'd honestly recommend getting a butane burner or a better made convection burner, just so it can get up to higher cooking ranges. But if you're just looking for something that can produce heat reliably, then it's worth grabbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Nice to have for small kitchen environment for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Nice to have for small kitchen environment for additional stove usage.
customer_reviews.author: JuJu

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's came early. Easy to use and clean. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sonnie Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Don't burn your hand!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the proce and boy does it heat up quick!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i tried using both the stove top but 1 would randomly turn off
customer_reviews.author: Rickey hoang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I would have done without this. So easy to use and convenient
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Camp at FULL HOOKUP sites.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for traveling and camping at full hook up sites.
customer_reviews.author: David Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect double burner
customer_reviews.text: Bought the unit for my box smoker. It has great temperature control. Works great all around
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: TAKES FOREVER TO BOIL WATER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: now bad. even on high setting forever to boil a pot or kettle of water. MUST USE LID. this does speed up boil, with some salt

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my sister says it takes a little long ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister says it takes a little long to boil water but works ok for most everything

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! This 2 burner works so well. Heats up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza G.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The worst product that I have received from Amazon. It arrived broken by the sides of the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Medina

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: Worked once great and 2nd time only one burner would work. Definitely a let down, especially while camping

customer_reviews.title: 2 extra burners huge assistance
customer_reviews.text: It’s great, especially when power goes out can cook plugging in with generator or hosting larger dinners & need a couple extra burners.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Z.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't fry bacon even with heat all the way up :c
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This lasted 2 months... one butner will no longer work and the other one will stop heating after a few minutes, starts again and even boiling water takes forever.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Have to replace quite often but I use it every day...worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Alicia kondrad

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Light weight, short cord, dual controls. Boils water fast! Cooks well. And it didn't break the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great thus far
customer_reviews.text: Works great thus far. I can cook anything with these two burners. Gets hot enough to boil water and clean up is very easy as well.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have small business and this product came in handy, it keeps me from having to use my stove. Great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Love this for mobil cooking
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Light weight and easy to store.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this burner unit!!
customer_reviews.text: This only worked for 2 months then went out! First the left side after 1 month, then the right side a month later! Very frustrating!!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, heats up very hot and cooks food amazingly and fast!

customer_reviews.title: Worth price
customer_reviews.text: Was worth the price. Only last a couple of months.

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect back up for my camper and home
customer_reviews.text: Got it in 3 days.. Tested it out and it heats fast! Boiled a quart of water fast.. This is a perfect back up for my camper and home..

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply constructed. First time, arrived with part of the plastic broken off INSIDE THE BOX Replacement arrived, with broken plastic pieces rattling around inside the item. Replacement being returned. Cheap. Poor quality. Do not buy.

customer_reviews.title: The plug-in cord is too short rendering it completely useless for where I can properly cook in my home
customer_reviews.text: The plug-in cord is too short rendering it completely useless for where I can properly cook in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended, poor quality, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. I eventually bought 3 because they kept burning out due to poor electrical connections at the burner element. The wire connectors were loose and may not have been rated for a high temperature connection as would be a minnimum standard. One incident, Their was a very loud bang, and blue flame fingers shot out of the metal casing. This could have resulted in serious injury and/or a house fire.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Turner

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this while I was at my Grandfathers when his stove was out. Worked great!

customer_reviews.title: ... no prob with this portable pots dont slide off like some reviews stated and it gets hot pretty quick
customer_reviews.text: had no prob with this portable pots dont slide off like some reviews stated and it gets hot pretty quick

customer_reviews.title: For the price, this burner setup is hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this burner setup is hard to beat. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the control knobs aren't very "accurate".

customer_reviews.title: Burnt out
customer_reviews.text: I brought this it burnt out only after 2 wks of use!

customer_reviews.title: it took longer than I expected to heat up but it was great for the job
customer_reviews.text: It did the job...it took longer than I expected to heat up but it was great for the job!

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only 9 months
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for 9 months with an everyday use. The heating system was not stable, when on HI it would burn the food and when I would lower it to MEDIUM it would turn off and the food would get cold. I’m very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: I should have paid more for a better model.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have any power. I should have paid more for a better model.

customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done but prefer something a little sturdier.

customer_reviews.text: excellent value for the price. work when needed in a motel

customer_reviews.text: Works very good, easy to control temp, good size for counter top.

customer_reviews.text: TURNED IT ON TO SEE IF IT HAD NO DEFECTS SO FAR IT IS WORKING PROPERLY

product_meta.title: IMUSA USA GAU-80306 Electric Double Burner 1750-Watts , Black
product_meta.description: From fiestas to sporting events to large Holiday gathering, This electric Double burner lets you cook anywhere you have a plug. Its compact and portable size also makes it ideal for the office, dorm rooms or small apartments.
feature_bullets: Can Be Used for Cooking Outdoors or in the Office
Features a Temperature Regulating Knob with Heat Distribution Coils

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars804 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
